description:
it's time for you to get a professional sounding, fully functional, podcast online and fast. We are going to get you over the technological hurdles so you can record your shows with perfect audio quality every time and get it posted quickly. We will then get you submitted to iTunes, Stitcher and other directories so you can be found by the masses.

Get your own podcast up and running now!

  • Learn from longtime podcaster and podcasting guru Steve Cherubino. Steve is the real deal and has been podcasting since 2008 with over 1000 shows under his belt.
  • Overcome that technical hurdle people seem to run into regarding recording their shows and posting them, that stops them in their tracks
  • Get submitted to iTunes and Stitcher which will gain you access to almost every podcast directory around
  • Learn the pro podcasting tricks that will make your show much more compelling than the next guy's.

It doesn't matter if you are on Mac or PC, all the tools we cover work on both platforms.

Get your podcast online now and I'll see you on the course!
title: Podcasting For Anyone - Quick and Easy
